title: "Push Alerts" UISwitch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Settings screen
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that a "Push Alerts" UISwitch exists
AND we will see that we can turn it ON with no problem
AND we will see that we can turn it OFF with no problem

title: "Push Alerts" turned ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we have the "Push Alerts" UISwitch set to "ON"
custom_expected: THEN we can successfully receive "Push Notifications"

title: "Push Alerts" turned OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we have the "Push Alerts" UISwitch set to "OFF"
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT receive any "Push Notifications"

title: Scoreboard - Game Cells - iPhone Collapsed Pre Game Doubleheader
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iPhone
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Scoreboard
and viewing a game in Preview State
and the game is a doubleheader
custom_expected: Then the game cell will display the doubleheader number

title: "Email Alerts" UISwitch can be toggled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Settings screen
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that a "Email Alerts" UISwitch exists
AND we will see that we can turn it ON with no problem
AND we will see that we can turn it OFF with no problem

title: "Email Alerts" turned ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we have the "Email Alerts" UISwitch set to "ON"
custom_expected: THEN we can successfully receive "Email Notifications"

title: "Email Alerts" turned OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we have the "Email Alerts" UISwitch set to "OFF"
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT receive any "Email Notifications"

title: "Challenge Request" Push Notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND User "B" is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps:
WHEN User "A" starts up a challenge type of "General MLB"
AND User "A" challenges User "B"
custom_expected: THEN User "B" will get a Push Notification message that they have been challenged by User "A"

title: "Challenge Request" Prompt Verification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN we receive a Challenge Request Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Push Notification message reads as "USERNAME has challenged you to a Head to Head matchup.  Start drafting your team now!"
and two buttons will be present beneath the message, Dismiss & Challenge

title: "Challenge Request" Banner Notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Banners" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we receive a Challenge Request Push Notification Banner
AND we swipe the Banner
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head App will open to the draft screen for that particular user
AND the user will be able to select an Infielder & an Outfielder

title: "Challenge" button on "Challenge Request"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on a "Challenge Request" Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head App will open to the draft screen for that particular user
AND the user will be able to draft their team

title: "Draft Notification" is sent to the Challenge Initiator only after the "Challenge Request" part has been completed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent completes the "Challenge Request" that they have been sent
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Initiator will receive "Draft Notification #1" as a Push Notification

title: On "Draft Notification #1," the proper message is displayed to the user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator receives a "Draft Notification #1" message
custom_expected:
THEN the message will read as "USERNAME has drafted their Infielder and Outfielder.  Make your next draft picks now!" 
and two buttons will be located underneath this message, Dismiss & Challenge

title: On "Draft Notification #1," the "Challenge" button allows the user to draft an Infielder & Outfielder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator taps on the "Draft Notification #1" message
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head App will open up to the Draft Screen
AND the user will be able to draft an Outfielder
AND the user will be able to draft a Flex Player

title: "Draft Notification #2" is sent to the Challenge Opponent only after the "Draft Notification #1" part has been completed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator has completed the "Draft Notification #1" part
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Opponent will receive a "Draft Notification #2" Push Notification

title: On "Draft Notification #2," the proper message is displayed to the user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a "Draft Notification #2" Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the message will read as "USERNAME has drafted their Infielder and Outfielder. Make your next draft picks now!" 
and two buttons will be located underneath this message, Dismiss & Challenge

title: On "Draft Notification #2," the "Challenge" button opens
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps:
WHEN a Challenge Opponent has received a "Draft Notification #2" Push Notification
AND the Challenge Opponent taps on the Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Head to Head App opens up successfully
AND we will see that the Challenge Opponent can draft a Flex Player
AND we will see that the Challenge Opponent can draft a Pitcher

title: "Draft Notification #3" is sent to the Challenge Initiator only after the "Draft Notification #2" part has been completed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent has completed their "Draft Notification #2" part
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Initiator will receive a "Draft Notification #3" Push Notification

title: On "Draft Notification #3," the proper message is displayed to the user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator receives a "Draft Notification #3" Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the "Draft Notification #3" message will read as "USERNAME has drafted their Flex Player and Pitcher. Make your next draft pick and complete your draft!" 
and two buttons will be located underneath this message, Dismiss & Challenge

title: On "Draft Notification #3," the "Challenge" button opens
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator taps on the "Draft Notification #3" Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head App will open up to the draft screen
AND the Challenge Initiator will be able to draft a Pitcher

title: "Draft Complete" is sent to the Challenge Opponent only after the "Draft Notification #3" part has been completed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator completes the "Draft Notification #3" part
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Opponent will receive a "Draft Complete" Push Notification

title: On a "Draft Complete," the proper message is displayed to the user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a "Draft Complete" Push Notification
custom_expected: THEN the message of the Push Notification will read as "Your draft with USERNAME is now complete and your challenge is set. Check out your lineup now!"

title: On a "Draft Complete," the "VIEW LINEUPS" button opens
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps:
WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a "Draft Complete" Notification
AND the Challenge Opponent taps on the "Draft Complete" Notification
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Head to Head App opens up to the "Challenge Lineup" screen
AND we will be able to see both lineups for the challenge

title: ***General MLB Challenge Notifications: In Challenge Message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head Installed
AND has Push Notifications Enabled
AND has completed a General MLB Challenge Draft
AND the Challenge has not yet started
custom_steps: WHEN it is within 15 minutes of the start time of the Challenge
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification:

> Scoring is underway for your General MLB challenge with OPPONENT NAME. Follow along for live updates.
> Dismiss | Go

AND tapping "Go" will bring the user to the Challenge Lineup screen

title: When a user challenges another user that they are sent a "Challenge Request" Push Notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN a Challenge Initiator sends a new Challenge to an opponent
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Opponent will receive a "Challenge Request" Push Notification

AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a "Challenge Request" Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the message will read as "USERNAME has drafted their Infielder and Outfielder. Make your next draft picks now!" 
and two buttons will be located underneath this message, Dismiss & Challenge

AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps:
WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a "Challenge Request" Push Notification
AND the Challenge Opponent taps on this Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head App will open up to the draft screen
AND the Challenge Opponent will be able to draft an Infielder
AND the Challenge Opponent will be able to draft an Outfielder

AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent has completed their "Challenge Request" part

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head

custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator receives a "Draft Notification #1" Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the Push Notification Message that the Challenge Initiator receives will read as "USERNAME has drafted their Infielder and Outfielder. Make your next draft picks now!"

custom_steps:
WHEN the Challenge Initiator receives a "Draft Notification #1" Push Notification

AND the Challenge Initiator will be able to draft an Outfielder

GIVEN we have installed Head to Head

AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent has completed the "Draft Notification #2" part
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Initiator will receive a "Draft Notification #3" Push Notification

custom_expected:
THEN the Challenge Initiator will see that the message displays as "USERNAME has drafted their Infielder and Outfielder. Make your next draft picks now!"

AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Initiator completes the "Draft Notification #3" part
custom_expected: THEN the Challenge Opponent will receive a "Draft Complete" Push Notification

AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps: WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a "Draft Complete" Push Notification
custom_expected:
THEN the "Draft Complete" Push Notification will read as "USERNAME has drafted their Infielder and Outfielder. Make your next draft picks now!" 
And two buttons will be located underneath this message, Dismiss & Challenge

AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the Challenge Opponent is not the MLB.com Expert
custom_steps:
WHEN the Challenge Opponent receives a "Draft Complete" Push Notification
AND the Challenge Opponent taps on the 'VIEW LINEUPS" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head Application will open up
AND the Head to Head Application will open up to the Challenge Lineup screen
AND the Challenge Lineup screen will show both lineups that have been drafted

title: ***Game Specific Challenge Notifications: In Challenge Message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head Installed
AND has Push Notifications Enabled
AND has completed a Game Specific Challenge Draft
AND the Challenge has not yet started
custom_steps: WHEN it is within 15 minutes of the start time of the Challenge
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification:

> Scoring is underway for your HOME TEAMCODE vs AWAY TEAMCODE challenge with OPPONENT NAME. Follow along for live updates. 
> Dismiss | Go

AND tapping "Go" will bring the user to the Challenge Lineup screen

title: "Matchup Loss" notification is only sent to the Matchup Loser
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN we lose a "Challenge"
custom_expected:
THEN the loser of the Challenge will receive a "Matchup Loss" Push Notification Message
AND the winner of the Challenge will NOT receive a "Matchup Loss" Push Notification Message

title: On a "Matchup Loss," the proper message is sent to the Matchup Loser
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user that has lost a Challenge receives a "Matchup Loss" Push Notification
custom_expected: THEN the "Matchup Loss" Push Notification reads as: "Sorry, WINNING USERNAME defeated LOSING USERNAME 17-12 in your Head to Head Challenge.  VIEW DETAILS >>"

title: On a "Matchup Loss," the "VIEW DETAILS" button opens up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has lost a "Challenge"
AND the user has received the "Matchup Loss" notification
AND the user has tapped on the "VIEW DETAILS" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head Application will open up
AND the Head to Head Application will be on the "Challenge Lineup" screen

title: "Matchup Win" notification is only sent to the Matchup Winner
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user wins a Challenge
custom_expected:
THEN the winning user will receive a "Matchup Win" Push Notification
AND the losing user will NOT receive a "Matchup Win" Push Notification

title: On a "Matchup Win," the proper message is sent to the Matchup Winner
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the winner of a challenge receives a "Matchup Win" Push Notification
custom_expected: THEN the "Matchup Win" message will display as: "Congratulations! You defeated LOSING USERNAME (yourpts) to (opponentpts) in your Head to Head Challenge."

title: On a "Matchup Win," the "VIEW DETAILS" button opens up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has won a Challenge
AND the user has received a "Matchup Win" Push Notification
AND the user taps on the "VIEW DETAILS" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head Application will open up
AND the user will see that the "Challenge Lineup" screen is displaying

title: "Badge Earned" notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND the user has never earned a badge before
custom_steps: WHEN the user achieves an "in-app achievement"
custom_expected: THEN the user in question will receive a "Badge Earned" Push Notification

title: On a "Badge Earned" notification, the proper message is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN a user has received a "Badge Earned" Push Notification
custom_expected: THEN the message being displayed is: "Congratulations! You just earned your first badge in MLB.com Head to Head Challenge. Check your profile often to see all the badges you've won!"

title: On a "Badge Earned" notification, the "VIEW BADGES" button opens up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN a user receives a "Badge Earned" Push Notification
AND the user taps on the "VIEW BADGES" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head Application will open up
AND the user's Badge Trophy Case screen will be visible

title: The "Badge Earned" notification is NOT sent after additional in-app achievements by user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
AND we have achieved one or more badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user achieves an "in-app achievement"
custom_expected: THEN the user in question will NOT receive a "Badge Earned" Push Notification

title: Users are sent a Push Notification reminding them to make their draft picks
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND the user has their "Push Alerts" toggled on
custom_steps: WHEN the user has started a challenge that exists in the state of "Pending"
custom_expected: THEN before the Lock Time on the "Pending Challenge" is reached the user will be notified to complete their draft picks

title: The TEXT displayed to the user is appropriate for specific notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN we receive a Push Notification reminding us to finish our picks
custom_expected: THEN the message displayed by the Push Notification will be one of "Don't forget to draft your players for <CHALLENGE NAME> before LOCK TIME!  DRAFT NOW >>"

title: The "DRAFT NOW" button opens the Head to Head Challenge App draft screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have enabled "Push Alerts" in settings
custom_steps: WHEN we receive a Reminder Notification
custom_expected:
THEN if we tap on the "Reminder Notification" it will open up the Head to Head Challenge App
AND the App will open to the draft screen for the user to select their current round of draft picks

title: "Leveling Up" notification is only sent to the user after they have reached a win/points threshold
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user reaches a win/points threshold to move up to the next level
custom_expected: THEN the user in question will receive a "Leveling Up" Push Notification

title: On a "Leveling Up" notification, the proper message is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps: WHEN a user receives a "Leveling Up" Push Notification
custom_expected: THEN the message displayed to this user will read as: "Congratulations!  You just achieved LEVEL STATUS in MLB.com Head to Head Challenge.  VIEW PROFILE >>"

title: On a "Leveling Up" notification, the "VIEW PROFILE" button opens up the Head to Head App's User Profile Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user receives a "Leveling Up" Push Notification
AND the user taps on the "VIEW PROFILE" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head Application will open up
AND the user will be brought to their User Profile screen

title: "Challenge not accepted" notification is only sent to the user if the Challenge Opponent rejects the Challenge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN a Challenge Opponent does NOT accept a Challenge
AND the Challenge Opponent has rejected the Challenge
AND the Draft is not completed by Lock Time
custom_expected:
THEN the Challenge Initiator will receive a "Challenge not accepted" Push Notification
AND the Challenge Opponent will NOT receive a "Challenge not accepted" Push Notification

title: "Challenge not accepted" notification that the proper message is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN a Challenge Opponent rejects a "Challenge"
AND the Challenge Initiator receives a "Challenge not accepted" Push Notification
custom_expected: THEN the "Challenge not accepted" message will read as: "Sorry, USERNAME did not accept your challenge.  Please try making a new challenge.  GO >>"

title: On a "Challenge not accepted" notification, the "GO" button opens the Head to Head App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the Head to Head Application
AND we have "Push Alerts" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN a Challenge Initiator has received a "Challenge not accepted" Push Notification
AND the Challenge Initiator taps on the "GO" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Head to Head Application will open up
AND the Head to Head Application will be displaying the "Challenge Lineup" screen

title: User is shown a Badge App Icon notification when there are pending challenges awaiting their pick
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user is not currently in the application
AND the user has notifications turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user receives a push notification regarding a pending challenge
AND it is the user's turn to draft
custom_expected: THEN an App Badge Notification will appear on the Head to Head icon

title: Users are not shown a Badge App Icon notificaiton for MLB Expert challenges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user is currently not in the application
AND the user is currently involved in a challenge with the MLB Expert
custom_steps: WHEN it is the user's turn to draft
custom_expected: THEN there will NOT be an app badge notification for the MLB Expert Challenge

title: Badge number increments based on pending challenges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head installed
AND the user is currently not in the App
AND the user has Push Notifications enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user receives notifications for multiple challenges
AND it is the user's turn to draft in more than one challenge
custom_expected:
THEN the App Badge Notification indicator will represent the number of challenges that are pending the user accurately
AND this will not count any challenges against the MLB Expert

title: Badge is removed if the user accesses the app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the user is not currently in the application
AND there is currently an App Badge Notification on the Head to Head app icon
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the app
custom_expected:
THEN the App Badge Notification indicator will reset
AND when the app is closed the App Badge Notification will b removed

title: Badge number is reset to zero when the user accesses the app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed Head to Head
AND the app is not currently open
AND push notifications are enabled
AND the user has outstanding challenges w/ badge notifications
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the app
AND completes their pending turn
AND closes the app
AND the App Badge Notification removes itself
AND the user receives a new notification that it's their turn
custom_expected:
THEN the App Badge Notification will NOT continue with the previous number
AND it will begin again at 1 (or however many new notifications the user received since last accessing the app)
